page.title: 11GOLF COURSE
page.content: {CHIPPENHAM GOLF COURSE}WAS BUILT{87 YEARS AGO . THE COURSE COVERS A TOTAL AREA OF{120 ACRES (18 HOLES)}.IT COSTS {260}POUNDS TO BECOME A MEMBER , THAT'S INCUDING V.A.T . THE CLUB IS OPEN ALL DAY ALL YEAR . YOU DO NOT HAVE TO BE A MEMBER TO PLAY ON THE COURSE , BUT YOU HAVE TO PAY A GREEN FEE . THERE ARE A TOTAL OF{600 }MEMBERS OF WHICH{475}ARE PLAYERS THE REST HAVE SPECIAL MEMBERSHIPS . THEY HAVE HELD THE AMATEUR , COUNTY AND PROFESSIONAL CHAMPIONSHIPS . TWO FAMOUS{RYDER CUP PLAYERS{NEIL COLES}AND{BRIAN HUGGETT HAVE PLAYED GOLF AT THE COURSE.
